alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Koochiching and northwestern St. Louis Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near International Falls, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kabetogama and Rainy Lake West around 710 PM CDT. Kabetogama Lake and Rainy Lake East around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ranier, Island View, Ericksburg and Ray. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
